products.name: Toothpaste Strawberry Mint
products.description: Our Kids Toothpaste delivers delightful, fruity freshness that kids love! Our fluoride-free formula helps brighten teeth, promote healthy teeth and gums, and fight tartar buildup.

products.name: Baby Lotion
products.description: Then we'll go with that data file! Can we have Bender Burgers again? Soothe us with sweet lies. What's with you kids? Every other day it's food, food, food. Alright, I'll get you some stupid food.

products.name: Lavender Hand Sanitizer Gel
products.description: We'll go deliver this crate like professionals, and then we'll go home. I've got to find a way to escape the horrible ravages of youth.

products.name: Pear Kiwi & Apple Smoothie
products.description: I videotape every customer that comes in here, so that I may blackmail them later. Who are you, my warranty?! So I really am important?

products.name: Disposable Nursing Bra Pads
products.description: Are you crazy? I can't swallow that. Have you ever tried just turning off the TV, sitting down with your children, and hitting them? Belligerent and numerous. Hey, whatcha watching?

products.name: Baby Powder
products.description: Our love isn't any different from yours, except it's hotter, because I'm involved. Please, Don-Bot… look into your hard drive, and open your mercy file!

products.name: Pacifier Bracelet
products.description: Oh, how awful. Did he at least die painlessly? …To shreds, you say. Well, how is his wife holding up? …To shreds, you say.

products.name: Diaper Ointment
products.description: I love you, buddy! I could if you hadn't turned on the light and shut off my stereo. Too much work. Let's burn it and say we dumped it in the sewer.

products.name: Baby Googles
products.description: It must be wonderful. What are their names? Oh sure! Blame the wizards! Man, I'm sore all over. I feel like I just went ten rounds with mighty Thor

products.name: Aloe Vera Baby Wipes
products.description: Bender, you risked your life to save me! And remember, don't do anything that affects anything, unless it turns out you were supposed to, in which case, for the love of God, don't not do it!
